content.detailedDescription: I was getting my telescope ready for a night of stargazing around 6;00  pm ,i noticed a bright light and a dimmer one in the western sky ,way too  early for any stars to be shinning that bright, i thought it might be an airplane light but an half hour passed it only got brighter and didn't move very much ( 2 finger width ) in the sky, so i grabbed my binoculars, the object almost looked like it was on fire ( glowing ) reddish-orange color and i then got my 6in orion telescope and took a look that's when things got strange. i noticed the object was three to four orbs turning and rotating but keeping a rectangular formation. i was excited and ran to get my wife to look and make sure i wasn't seeing things and when she confirmed seeing exactly what i saw, i immediately got goose bumps. i watched it for about a half an hour and it faded into the distance.
content.summary: I saw what appeared to be four lights rotating and turning together through my telescope and they almost looked like they were glowing a redish orange color

content.detailedDescription: On january 19th, at approximately 6:45 pm., while we were standing on our back deck bbqing (east side of house), my youngest son noticed a large star-like object hovering in the north-east sky about one-half mile from our home. i was busy tending to our grill, when he hit my arm lightly and inquired to me as to what the object was. i quickly glanced up in the direction that he was looking, which my first reaction to it was that it was jupiter; however i was taken a little aback, because i had just looked up in the sky in that general direction and the object was not there--it seemed to appear out of nowhere. he continued to watch the object for about a minute, when he hit my arm again and told me that it was moving. i made a much longer observation of the object, and as he had described to me, the object was moving around in slight movements that gave the appearance that it was slightly moving back and forth. the object was clearly below the cloud cover, because the bright intense white light was reflecting on the clouds above it in the darkness. we could see an airplane flying somewhat above this object, as described further to me by my son as "being above the clouds". we watched this object intently, as it then began to move slowly up into the cloud cover, and we could see that the object was pushing the clouds away from it as it moved diagonally up through the bank. the light was a very bright white and we could see the light from this object reflecting on the clouds as it pushed its way through the cloud bank. it continued diagonally up until it moved out of sight completely. not wanting to assume anything, i remained outside for an additional 10 minutes until the clouds separated to get a clear view of all of the stars, so i could make a clear judgement on whether it was just a regular star, or jupiter. there were no stars in the sky anywhere that resembled what my son and i witnessed just 10 minutes before. i waited for two more days to see when jupiter raised off of the horizon, in order to get a better idea of jupiter's position in the sky. the object appeared roughly 30 to 40 degrees to jupiter's left, and the object was much higher in the sky than jupiter at the same time of the evening.
content.summary: My youngest son and i observed a large white star-like object hovering near our home.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, steped outside for a cigarett. i noticed coming from the south a triangular shape of white lights heading north. i have seen these before therfore knew what i was seeing. as it made its way norht the formation turned north west and changed from large triangle to small one. it then turned to the east and changed back to large triangle shape. then it turned north for the final time and changed to almost a human form formation. a head, shoulders, and arms. thats the best i can describe it. it then sped up went back into triangl and hauled but to the north. these also were different than the first time in that they had flashing white lights occasionally.
content.summary: 6 to 8 white orbs or lights that flew in formation with formation and direction changes.

content.detailedDescription: The sunrise was so beautiful on the morning of 16 december 2014, so i decided to step out the front door, onto the porch and take a picture of the sunrise.  i didn't see anything unusual, as i took the picture.  upon review of the picture, i noticed there was an object (egg shaped with a line through it) in the middle of the picture.  the object has a line through it, a "ring around it".  there are power lines across the street, but the line/ring in the middle of the egg-shaped object is not a power line.  i don't know what the object is, but it kind of freaked me out.  of course after i discovered the object in the picture, i looked outside and there was nothing there, just the glorious sunrise.  it was only a matter of a couple of minutes from the time i took the picture and the time i reviewed and discovered the object in the picture.
content.summary: I took a picture of the sunrise and upon review of the picture, i saw what seems to be a ufo in the picture.  i didn't see it before i took the picture, only afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: These 4 objects were orange and about the size of the moon. full moon that night. 3 were stacked one on top of the other and the 4th was in front of the center sphere. they did not move and i can,t really recall how they disappeared. they were just gone when i went back to watching tv. i just noticed them thru my window when i was watching tv and just stepped outside to look at them. in my excitement i completely forgot about my movie camera and camera which i always have with me. i saw these outside of my home in the early evening of october 2012 these objects did not move  while i was looking at them. i was very excited.
content.summary: 4 orange spheres. 3 staked 1 above the other. 4th stacked in front of center 3 spheres.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend sarah is the one who witnessed them, she said there was about 20 lights in the sky and that they where to bright to be stars, the one on the edge seemed stationary some in the middle moved around, she pulled over to get a picture but thought nothing showed up. and when she took the picture most where gone, when she got home she sent me the picture, on close up you can see a saucer shape. they just seemed to disappear. zoom in between the street lights!
content.summary: Turned corner and notice extra bright lights in the sky about 20 of them

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from wellington, ontario where we watched a ball hockey game at the local arena.  it was a summer night and we didn't leave until 9-10pm.  my husband at the time wasn't feeling well so we pulled over and i got into the drivers seat to drive.  before i pulled back onto the road i noticed how quiet and dark it was....There were no stars or moon that i could see, no crickets or night sounds....I stayed on the side of the road and pointed out the above info to the husband and then we got out, i believe, of our vehicle and we looked up and realized we couldn't see the sky at all unless we looked to our extreme left or right of the thing in the sky. it seemed it was just above the tree line it moved so slow that i though it was stationary but i eventually realized it was moving and it was huge!  very black and no lights anywhere and absolutely silent.  it was going in one direction with no variations. the trees in this area are pretty big and there are many so we lost sight of it as it passed over a couple of acres of trees. this must have went on for at least 10 to 15 mins until it dissap  this was the second time i have seen an unexplained flying object.  nothing that large could be that quiet....At least nothing that human kind has the intelligence for in my opinion.  as for how i felt, to this day i cannot remember alot for some reason but i know i was pumped, exvited and then unbelieving.
content.summary: Bigger then 2 football fields, no sound whatsoever, and very slow moving and was above a field of radio tower

content.detailedDescription: Looking out my bedroom window that faces the west,was 4 bright lights all together,but as one object.Red ,white,clear light coming slowly toward my house,up higher than the powerlines,then as i got on the computer to do this,i walked back to look out my bedroom window and it was gone like it had never even been there. i watch the night sky every night,all seasons,live in the country,love to watch all i can see.I was elated to see this marvel.
content.summary: 7:08pm was up in the west outside my window,gone by 7:15pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the balcony ofmy house somking a cigar when saw in th ske a bright object, first it seems a asteroid but it was on straigh horizontal line in the sky from south to north. the 1st though was that was a plana but  it  appears to speckle  and in one or 2 times  2 flashes were trown awy from the object.
 this event , at the time, make me a bit confused and thinking that i was nuts, lol, so i don´t saw it  to much time  and i´ve enter inside my house. but until today i still remember it.
content.summary: Bright light over the sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My son took a picture
content.summary: Moving lights 4 of them

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 2 years ago, i was driving thru ina, illinois, behind 4 eighteen wheel rigs, each measuring 75 feet long in or about the month of august on a foggy night when truck driver in front rig stated on cb, "in all my years i have heard about it but now i'm seeing it, is that a ufo?" "be careful looks like its coming down." as i looked i saw ufo with lights all around it begin to descend and i asked "is there an airport?" driver from 3rd rig responded, " i live around here and there is only a college and a prison and a lake." i observed object coming down and my rig started to tremble and i saw it very close to my rig since i was the last one in the caravan of rigs, i started honking at which time, ufo made a slight ascend to avoid hitting me and went right over my rig into a lake located off of interstate 57 called "rend lake."  i recall front  rig driver saying "be careful whoever is in the back" at which point i saw the big disc star trek like object with lights all around it dive into rend lake making no noise and no splash when object went into water. my trailer shook and trembled and i felt it was going to tip over at which time i started honking to alert object and object missed hitting my trailer by small distance. i had no choice but to slow down instead of "stepping on it like front truck driver was screaming into the cb, as by the time the object reached us, i had no time to speed but slow down to avoid the object crashing into my truck. as flying object was coming down towards the lake, lights on object started going counterclockwise and spinning.  i had to slow down from the then 55 mph limit to 20 miles mph in order to avoid space craft hitting my truck/rig. as a truck driver i noticed that in the summer, the green hides the lake and unless a person is familiar with the area there is no way of knowing lake rend is there, where i saw the space craft go into the dark water lake.  my heart was beating and i was racing with time in a truck/rig caravan as a truck driver where my only option was to slow down and honk at the space craft in order to avoid it hitting me since i was at the end of the truck/rig caravan.  there is a rest area near this lake and i was traveling south when ufo object went into the lake on the opposite side of the interstate highway.  there are two lakes there, one on each side of the highway and i lost sight of the object when it went into landed into the lake and disappeared into the lake rend.
content.summary: I saw a ufo land into a lake in ina, illinois while driving thru in a caravan of eighteen wheel rigs

content.detailedDescription:
In titusville, florida at about 15:30hrs local, while photographing sun dogs in scattered cirrus clouds, i observed 3 silver orbs followed by the appearance of "angel hair."   the orbs, visible for about 5 seconds, were south of my location (28.557730n 80.822619w) at an elevation of about 80 degrees moving from the west to the east.  the orbs were very small, not larger than the end of a pencil eraser, and appeared to be above the cirrus clouds.  

the angel hair varied in length from a few inches to several feet with some in small clump and extremely gossamer like in appearance.  my attempts to collect a sample of the "ah" failed as it would either dissolve when touched or float away in the air current from the movement of my hand.  some was visible in the trees but none on the ground.

weather at the time of the sighting was cool and clear with scattered cirrus clouds above a very thin base of alto stratus.  contrails, persistent scattering, were clearly visible.  at  14:47 hrs local the noaa report at the space center executive airport (ktix) (28.513472n 80.800150w) was winds variable at 5 mph, 7.00 miles visibility, 63 degrees f, 36 degrees f dew point, 37% relative humidity, altimeter 30.00 inches.
content.summary: Three silver orbs followed by appearance of angel hair

content.detailedDescription:
1- in the park with my frindes

2- huge lights behinde the cloudes

3- it was a huge space ship

4- it move down and gong behind the clouds and again

5- it was scary . i call the police and say that

6- it went up to the sky and it go to the space .

it was a very big space ship
content.summary: It was a huge space ship

content.detailedDescription: We had a dinner reservation at 5:30 pm on new year's eve, so i went outside to get the car started and warm.  it was dark. on the way to the car i saw an object looking like a quarter moon with the bottom left corner filled in.  the object moved over a hillside, just over the top of the hill.  it finally went behind the trees but i could still see the light from it.  the object moved in a jerky fashion, almost like i was looking at a series of photographs projected in the sky, in first a westward direction, and later north, behind the trees on top of the hill. i watched it for about 30 seconds from the driveway, and then when it disappeared behind the trees i walked out in the yard where i could still see the light it made for a few more seconds.
content.summary: An object resembling a quarter moon moves over trees on hilltop in jerky fashion

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a smoke when a light caught my eye south of my home.  i live in a rural area so things in the sky are very easy to see. it was a very bright orange fireball looking thing just above the treeline.  it fell very slowly like something on fire falling from the sky.  it was very bright orange (like fire).  it did not make any noise and appeared to be a few miles away. it was not a falling star.  it was much larger than that and could not be confused with a star.  it fell below the treeline so i couldn't tell if it landed or where it actually was. i just know it was falling slowly to the ground. i have seen strange things in the sky before, but this one was very unusual. sorry, didn't have my phone on me for pictures.

i have seen strange lights around here lately, but have been reluctant to report until now. another incident involved a hovering white light moving up and down and sided to side around 6 am around january 15, 2015 (sorry, not sure of date, but appearing to hover like a helicopter would but had no sound.
content.summary: Orange fireball falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving milledgeville georgia headed back to atlanta and before heading to the greyhound station i snapped two photos with my iphone 6+ out of the photos the second photo that i took happen to have an object in it with a light that i cannot describe
content.summary: Took picture

content.detailedDescription:
This statement is made by myself, voluntarily disseminated, and made public, without promise or reward, nor of threat of reprisal.

this statement is true, clear, complete, concise, correct.  i don't know it it is something that is owned by a government entity, domestic or otherwise, or is/was from extra-terrestrial origin. 

i know it sounds as if i'm not in full possession of what god gave me, but i assure you, i did see this object. i'm sure there are other crafts out there that have been or soon shall be observed. 

my regret is i didn't divulge this information sooner. you put the math to the size of this craft and how fast it moved, i think you might be hesitant to report it too

i have only told this information to one other person, before this date.
after reading this, i think you will understand why i haven't relayed this information before now.  

i'm 10 yr. active duty, medical retired disabled vietnam veteran: followed by 20 yrs. [occupation and plavce of employment removed/cms/tg]. i am a christian, truthful, non-deliberate lie speaking person. 

this may cause some to say i'm a nut case, but that's okay. i know what i saw. read the rest of this, i think you will agree, there are things happening in american airspace, and other locations, that big brother doesn't want the populace to not know about. they think we, the general public can't make rational decisions about new information.

i lived about 3 blocks from the prison, and about equidistant from the school district, jr high school, hence more than copious amounts of/and adequate illumination to see anything very clearly and distinctly, was available in the area.

the time of year was still warm weather, i didn't wear a jacket, just not sure which year it was, mid 1996 to fall 1999. i departed my domicile approx. 21:30 hrs, to report to work. i stepped out on the uncovered porch, i turned to grasp the door knob, to pull it closed and secure it. 

when i did, i happened to see a movement of an object in the air, behind the four 50-60 feet tall elm trees, growing in the corner of the yard. 
the upper limbs of the trees, was between me and the this aircraft of unknown origin as observed from my front porch, as it was traveling in the air.

i glanced to the east-north-east and upward at about 45 degrees, and watched it continue on suspected path toward a point between bonner springs ks. and edwardsville ks. 

the craft i saw was a large black rectangle shape, "shoe box" approximately 800'x 400'x 200' best guess of size, quietly, and w/o any detected atmospheric disturbance, nor motor noise, of any type. 

there was large yellow-orange lens, similar to turn signal color, maybe 20' diameter, perhaps every 50' along the length of the craft. there was smaller maybe 10' diameter, frosted or semi-clear lens, white light along the upper edge of the craft. 

i was so taken aback i stood there watching it move through the air. i never in my lifetime would i ever see a u.F.O. after about 10 seconds, i thought "need a photo" i hurriedly went back into the house to get my camera. this took about 20 seconds. i was unable to find it. i went back out on the porch, and the object was gone. 

it had progressed past the horizon toward the east-north-easterly from a west-south-westerly in that maybe 20 seconds of time. to put it in hunter's lingo, it was quartering away from me, to my left.

later doing the math from the time i last saw it,(perhaps 20 seconds) it started traveling >400 mph, to travel that far, in such a short elapse of time, and an elevation of about 100 feet, above the deck. 

if i could draw, i would submit same for your information: if you get someone to talk with me, i will describe what i saw, and that person can render a sketch of the area and aircraft i reference in my narrative. 

m.U.F.O.N. representative(s) may edit this for clarity purposes, as needed or deemed necessary.
content.summary: Saw xxxxlg. shoebox shape traveling about 20 mph, as i left my house enroute to work

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on i-4 west driving back home to our apartment in altamonte springs, fl. i was looking out the passenger side window and saw 3 flickering orange objects. as we were exiting off i-4 on to sr 434 i asked my husband if he could see all 3 lights. he could see only 2. as we continued on sr 434 south the 3 objects were in the western sky. we were traveling at 45 mph on sr 434. i lost sight of the objects a few times because of trees and buildings along the route. a few blocks away from i-4, i could only see 2 of the objects. i'm not sure of the flightpath because we were in a moving vehicle. i lost sight completely of the objects when were at the intersection of wekiva springs rd and sr 434.The objects were a bright orange and they flickered. there was no noticeable landing lights or directional lights. i also saw what looked like an airplane passing between two of the objects. 
i was surprised to see these objects again. i had spotted something similar a few years ago in deltona, fl. while at my parents home. as soon as we arrived at our home we got out of our car and looked to see if the lights/objects had followed. when we went into our home we walked out to the back patio to see if they would appear.
content.summary: Driving home, 3 ufo's sighted out passenger side window.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting a friend in conroe, tx after the thanksgiving holiday.  around approximately 1am on the morning of sat. november 29, 2014, i went up to the 2nd floor guest room where i was staying to go to bed.  the room has a big window that looks out over their backyard.  there are houses to each side of them but only a wooded area behind them.  there are no houses, streets or other roads behind them.  my window was open but the curtains were drawn.  just seconds after i had laid down on the bed, i saw two bright flashes of blue light thru my window in short succession.  they were like pulses of light; they were very intense and focused.  they did not cause the entire window curtain nor the dark room around me to illuminate only the areas where they flashed thru the curtain.   i had never seen anything like it.  i immediately thought ‘what the heck is that’, but for whatever reason i didn’t get up to go to the window.  then after a short pause, though the curtains i began to see bursts of white lights that appeared to be exploding like fireworks in or behind the backyard (although there was no sound whatsoever).  this continued for what seemed like around 30 seconds to one minute, so i finally got up to investigate.  by this time the bursts were dying down, but when i pulled back the curtain i seemed to see a single round object illuminated with white light – the lighted object was fading and by the time i got my glasses on to get a better look, it was gone.  i waited for a while to see if there would be any other lights, but i saw none.  no further lights appeared during the rest of my visit either.  

i didn’t think much about the strange lights in my bedroom for the next couple of days, but then i began to feel a very strange sensation in my right knee.  it wasn’t pain, it was more like a sensitivity if anything.  the tissue underneath the skin felt strangely as if it had been sliced, but i saw no breaks of skin, abrasions or bruises.   i know it sounds crazy, but for some reason, at that point i started thinking about the weird lights in my room and wondering if there was any connection.  then, when i went thru security at the airport on the way back home to california, the tsa body scanned revealed some anomaly on my right kneecap.  the tsa patted the area down, found nothing and let me continue on my way.  the odd sensitivity of my skin around my kneecap continued for some weeks even after i got home.  

after seeing the objects on 12/22/14 as described in my other report #62878, i also can’t help but wonder if there some connection between what happened to me in texas and what i videoed on 12/22/14.   it’s a little unsettling but mostly i would just like to find out what it was.
content.summary: Flashes of blue light thru my window, then bursts of white light scattered around back yard, 1 white glowing object observed

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were outside at 1 am to look at the stars then i notice a round object flying in the sky hovering a field then the field was covered with bright blue\teal lights then the object came flying to my house the came lower to the ground me and my friend didnt know what to do so we just stared then the object flew higher into the sky and then was hovering over my nieghbors house beaming a light into the sky then it left and we didnt see it anymore about 10 mins later i told my cousin to come out side with us then about 5 mins later the field started to glow again and the flying object was hovering the field once again but there was 2 objects once we looked the objects dissapered
content.summary: It was a big flying object with purple or teal light

content.detailedDescription: i first seen the object when i pulled up to my house after work. i noticed it in the sky, the thing that made me notice it was that it appeared red, at first i thought it was maybe that asteroid that was supposed to fly by close to earth. but i noticed the inside of the red sphere was yellow and pulsated, it was bizarre, i never have seen any plane or helicopter have lights like that. so i went to my backyard and decided to film it with my iphone 5 camera. i noticed it began to descent, it eventually disappeared behind the small hill that is visible from my backyard. whatever it was, it was closer than what i originally thought it was, i felt excitement because i believe i filmed a actual ufo. but with that being said, the only thing i think it could of been would of been some sort of globe or something that someone could of been flying around, that's the only explanation other than something extraterrestrial.
content.summary: Red orb ufo that hovered then descended until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday, 12/22/14; approx. 12:40p
i had met some friends for lunch at a restaurant in the alviso area of san jose, ca on monday, december 22, 2014.  i was returning to work and i exited eastbound hwy. 237 at mccarthy blvd. in milpitas.  as i approached the traffic signal at the intersection of the frontage road at mccarthy blvd., looking eastward toward the mountains i noticed what appeared to be 5-6 metallic spheres hovering above the foothills, swaying slightly back and forth over the cityscape.  they appeared to be moving in unison, not breaking their formation.  puzzled and surprised, i pulled out my iphone and began videoing what i thought were the spheres.  after a few seconds, i zoomed my phone in to get what i hoped would be a better shot.   i was only able to remain stopped at the intersection for a few moments, then the light changed to green and traffic began moving, so i stopped recording and drove back to the office.

eager to view what i thought i had just videoed, i pulled into a parking space at my office and replayed the video.  i was initially greatly disappointed as the video didn’t show any signs of the spheres.  maybe i was filming in the wrong area – i had hurriedly pulled out my phone and was only able to be at the intersection for a few moments.  for some reason, the video also initially played for the entire length in slow motion.  i watched it a couple of times and was about to give up hope, thinking maybe what i saw hadn’t actually been there, when i noticed a moving object in the video - just not one i had seen as i was filming.  the black object starts off diagonally above the traffic signal and to the left, moves down below the level of the signal, then moves up and to the right just above the signal, shoots diagonally to just the top of the street light nearest to the traffic signal, then back down about mid-way between the streetlight and traffic signal.  

the object then begins a straight ascent upward toward the top of the cloud bank, disappearing through the clouds momentarily, then re-appearing about 2/3 of the way to top of the clouds on the right hand side of the picture.  it stops there briefly and then makes a rapid diagonal leftward descent, partially through the clouds, back to near its original position in the video.  it then makes another rapid diagonal rightward ascent back up into the clouds, appearing again near the top of the cloud bank, only to make another fast diagonal descent back through the clouds.  unfortunately, this is the point where i zoom the video in to the metallic spheres i was seeing.    the object is briefly seen in larger detail before the zoom takes it out of the picture altogether – it does not appear again during the rest of the slow motion video.

this object wasn’t the reason i had made the video, and didn’t see it at all when i initially filmed.  at first  i thought the object might have been a bird.  it was only later, when the video starting playing at its normal speed did i realize how fast this occurred.  i don’t think it could be a bird with the speed of the object; and way it moves in and out of the clouds seems to indicate some distance.  for this same reason i don’t think it could be an insect.   also, the entire length of time of the object is seen in the video is only around 5-6 seconds in real time.

this incident followed another very strange experience that happened to me approximately 3 weeks earlier in southeast texas that i will report separately in the database.  

i have video that i took of the 12/22/14 sighting on my iphone that i converted to mov format, both in slow motion and regular speed.  unfortunately, both videos play sideways.  i’m happy to share this with mufon for viewing/investigation purposes but i am uncomfortable with the exclusive license wording on the license to show/rebroadcast it as well as it wording on the website indicating that video attached to the report is viewable by the public.
content.summary: Saw 5-7 metallic spheres hovering - videoed the area - video revealed dark object not originally seen.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside about 1:15am i noticed 2 red-orange lights in the sky coming into view over the trees from the north. they appeared to be following each other. they moved across the sky in a matter of seconds going in a south direction. those 2 disappeared shortly after the point when they would be "straight above". then about a minute later another pair of lights came following the same path, and those disappeared around the same point. i thought i had been recording it on my phone but it just took 1 photo unfortunately.
content.summary: Saw 4 red-orange lights crossing the sky from n to s then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette star gazing as i often do when i saw a steady moving light that was moving faster than any plane i've ever seen. it came from directly south and was heading directly north according to my compass. it didn't appear to speed up nor did it slow down. i looked around for a plane to compare it to and i couldn't find one which was odd because i usually see them often living within an hour from the airport. it had come and gone within 90 seconds i'd say. i continued to watch because i wanted to see if i could locate a plane or was curious if something was going to follow its path. within about two minuets i witnessed a slower moving object with a steady blinking light come from the east to the west. it didn't have a red and green starboard and port lights like most planes and it was a very clear sky. all of these events took place between 620 pm and 625 pm. i didn't stay to watch the blinking light because it would have took far too long for it to leave eye sight. i would say the first object was moving at least 4 to 5 times the speed of the second object.
content.summary: I was looking at the stars as i often do and saw a bright solid light move faster than any plane i've ever seen with no port or starboard lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home it was very foggy outside.  i seen a bright light above my vehicle.  i looked in rearview mirror but saw nothing.  nothing was in front of me either.  my vehicle would not respond to anything i was trying to do. i tried to brake, nothing, i tried to steer, nothing. i was driving 25mph, my vehicle jumped to 45mph.  i thought this was a ufo. i saw a sign ahead that indicated there was a 90 degree corner coming up.  i still did not have control over my vehicle.  my vehicle simply drove off the road into the ditch where i struck a sign, telephone pole, and a tree.  when the vehicle was finally stopped the object was gone, and my vehicle was responding to me at last.  i was able to turn off my vehicle as well as turn it back on and the lights worked also. i was confused, hurt, tramatized, and angry by this.  i had a great deal of serious injuries all over my body by this experience. my vehicle was totaled.
content.summary: Hovered above my vehicle then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: The sun was shinning from the right, i saw this light in the sky i recorded 12 seconds then went down stairs outside and recorded another 12 seconds then i when back up stairs i saw it it shoot off very fast to the left before i could record any more, this is true and factual and i would like an explanation thank you
content.summary: Hovered for about a minite then shot off at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
3 seagulls in the southeast part of the sky that turned in to small pin sized glowing balls of light.  i was able to capture one on video.  it is very hard to see, but i took a photo of the video where you can see one remaining seagulls turning into a white glowing ball of light.  below i will break down the sighting for you until i am able to write up a report.  your website wouldn’t load on my computer for whatever reason, so here you go.  below are the following details.

location:  los angeles, ca/playa vista 90066

		south east in the sky (very high up)
time:   11:41am 1140hrs

duration:  2 minutes tops

sighting:  i stepped outside my upstairs patio to enjoy a cup of coffee this afternoon.  i looked up to admire the beautiful weather and the clear sky. i noticed a group of seagulls flying in formation.  they passed, then three seagulls remained flying in the air without the rest of the group.  as i continued to watch the birds i kept thinking my mind was playing tricks on me due to the height of the birds.  they seemed to be flying higher and higher in the sky with a swirl type motion without flapping their wings.  then the more i looked at the birds, the wings seemed to morph into their bodies.  i was only able to focus on one bird as they appeared smaller.  it got smaller and smaller then turned into a white dot in the sky.  the next thing that happened is that it started to glow a white bright light.  then lastly it turned into a tiny, red, glowing dot in the sky.  it was the size of a tiny star in the sky, but glowing red in broad daylight in a clear blue sky.  it was the most bizarre thing i think i ever witnessed.  basically i saw a seagull turn in a glowing orb.  the best part about it was i caught it on my iphone.  it is very hard to see.
content.summary: Seagulls morphing into white/red glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: I have always been facinated with space and i frequent the planetarium app and google moon as well as ustream iss live and this whole month of january i have witnessed daily visits to iss and have included images i was able to screen capture on my cell phone kinda strange that the black vault would be flooded with these documents the same week all the amazing visits and ufo sightings. i have some many images not sure wich to include if i cant shate them all
content.summary: Ufos seen at iss on moon and in deep space

content.detailedDescription: I was relaxing on the patio of the ocean home i rented on vacation in isla mujeres, mexico. i had noticed the large frigate birds and wanted to get a picture of one which was near.  i took 3 pictures with my ipad and when i looked at them i noticed this strange object descending into the water on the 2nd and 3rd pictures. i had not seen the object prior to that review.  you can see it at about 50 feet above the water on the 2nd picture and then it appears to be entering the water a few seconds later in the 3rd picture.  my friends and i could not explain the photos and none of us actually saw the strange object.  i really feel that  i unknowingly photographed a ufo.
content.summary: An unusual object landed in the sea near us.

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw a single glowing orange circle in the sky.  coming from the west side of interstate 95 it crossed over taking a single path and ascending into the sky over the ocean just to "disappear".  then i witnessed 3 in a triangular pattern do the same thing.  then 2 did the same thing.  then one.  then another.  i have video as well.  
a person who lives in my neighborhood also saw one of them.  she said when the light went out she would still see a silver circle  in the sky.
content.summary: Orange glowing orbs in the sky over north palm beach county
